title: Scouting report: What do England have to fear from unpredictable France in Pool C decider?
text:
Who tops Pool C will be dictated by next Saturday's match between France and England. Both teams are currently on three wins from three although England have an extra two bonus points.

Kate Rowan examines the key reasons why Eddie Jones' team should fear the French but also why there is no reason to fret in training this week.

Two reasons to fear France

Unpredictability

It is the cliche that Les Bleus seem happy to embody. The old question of “which France will show up” is still as pertinent as ever. In each of their pool games they have switched between the sublime and the ridiculous.

There have been grumbles in the French media that the desire to still “jouez, jouez” is dated as “systems” and...
description: Who tops Pool C will be dictated by next Saturday's match between France and England.
